thread.title: Monika Skowronska
thread.title_full: Initial Hygiene IE reviewed by Monika Skowronska

author: Monika Skowronska
title: Monika Skowronska
text: I would like to compliment nice and polite gentelmen who comes every week to exchange our mats for the clean ones. He is always smiling and looks like he's full of joy. I wish I could have his attitude. He can make your day telling a short joke or just simnply cheer you up or adore you with great manners. Thank you for great service!
